channel.title: How to add an owner crown to a client
channel.description:
I'm wonder how to add a new crown, so that the admins and owners crowns aren't the same color.
Please, can somebody help i have the image that i want how do i add it to player rights 3?

item.title: How to add an owner crown to a client
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

wrong section + this has been asked one billion times b4…

go to spirits in client folder… there look what the name of the crown is in your spirit folder
then copy name or remember it… then go to client.java (client sided) and search for that and
then add ur crown to spirit’s folder and change name of the one in client.java and voila!!!
u should use ur own crowns…

somone correct me if im wrong… haven’t done this since christmas and i don’t remember very well

kneistol

Read full topic
item.source: How to add an owner crown to a client
